name: ALCOM
creator: anatawa12
description: ALCOM is a fast open-source alternative of VRChat Creator Companion.

name: LazyOptimiser
creator: Euan
description: Ever get annoyed you have to go back and re-optimise an avatar because you want to add / adjust something? Want to push what your avatar can do but frustrated by the amount of time that you need to spend optimising? Well you too can be lazy (somewhat) in your avatar creation but still be (somewhat) optimised using these automated tools!

name: VR RefAssist
creator: LiveDimensions
description: A set of custom attributes for UdonSharp to automate usually time-consuming references and repetitive tasks.

name: FlexiCurve
creator: RED_SIM
description: This is a tool for procedural generating curve-based meshes, such as fairy lights, garlands, wires and more! This asset is perfect to decorate your VRChat worlds without going to Blender or any other 3rd party software. (The asset is free to download on my Patreon page)

name: SDK Tools
creator: YIMIR
description: QoL Tool for the VRChat SDK3 Avatar

name: UdonProfiler
creator: Lyra
description: UdonProfiler is a deep profiling utility designed for benchmarking UdonSharp scripts. It allows world developers to measure script performance by taking user-defined samples defined at specific code segments, in a similar fashion to Unity's built-in deep profiling utility.

name: VRChat API Tracker
creator: Dustuu
description: Tracks and publishes information including VRChat World Stats, VRChat Group Membership/Roles, Discord Server Membership/Roles, Patreon Membership, & Gumroad Purchases.

name: VRC Menu Translator
creator: Cascadian
description: A Unity Editor tool that lets you translate VRChat expression menu and menu control names individually or all at once.

name: MicroSplatVRC
creator: TealDealMeal
description: This script and setup allows you to use the MicroSplat shader in VRChat

name: VRChat Linking Bot
creator: miner28_3
description: VRChatLinking is a free Discord bot and website service that enables users to link their VRChat and Discord accounts. This integration grants users access to special features and content provided by world creators, enhancing their experience within the VRChat platform. VRChatLinking empowers world creators by allowing them to adjust various settings and configurations through the website, change the format, and decide what users from their discord get included in the generated JSON. It also allows for connecting a VRChat Group to a Discord server and enables automatic group invites.

name: VRCCustomExpressionUtility
creator: Y I M I R
description: VRCCustomExpressionUtility is an easy to use tool to create expressions for the Radial menu.

name: TexturePlaceholderSetter - Editor Script
creator: OwlBoy
description:
- Change material's _MainTex to a chosen image upon exiting play mode in Unity Editor.

- A simple script that might be useful to people using a simple Udon ImageLoader.

- Feel free to open issues.

name: Video Player Shim
creator: ArchiTechAnon
description: An out-of-the-box solution for enabling full videoplayer functionality in unity's playmode. Supports UnityVideo, AVPro and YTDL integration. Instructions on the Release page.

name: RATS
creator: Razgriz
description: Harmony-based Unity Editor QOL

name: VRCSDK Video Player Shim
creator: ArchiTechAnon
description: Collection of scripts which enable out-of-the-box AVPro usage in PlayMode. Supports YTDL integration for both UnityVideo and AVPro. Works with any video player implementation. For AVPro to work, you must import the trial package. Read the setup instructions for more info.

name: SetVRPlayerSettings
creator: Razgriz
description: This script provides some quick options under Tools -> VR Player Presets to apply specific VR SDK settings, for testing shaders and content in Stereo or with a headset. It overrides the SDK's default setting of "None" whenever scripts are reloaded, or builds are performed.

name: ImprovedColliderEditor
creator: aurycat
description: Improve the Inspector for collider components. Includes a move handle in the scene view and color-coded ID numbers to help you identify multiple colliders on the same object.

name: AutoAnimatorMerger
creator: aurycat
description: A tool to merge Animator Controllers. It can do a one-time merge of a source into a target, or automatically merge any number of animators into a new generated animator every time you build or enter play mode.

name: AssetBundleStat
creator: lox9973
description: A WinDirStat-like online asset bundle inspector, intended for build size optimization

name: Lightbox Viewer
creator: Ha√Ø~
description: Lightbox Viewer lets you simultaneously visualize changes in shader material settings under different lighting conditions.

name: SetAvatarAnimatorOnPlay
creator: aurycat
description: Automatically sets the animator controller on your avatar when entering Play Mode, so you can leave it unset in Edit Mode and not risk your avatar getting stuck in bicycle pose.

name: SwitchToSceneViewOnPlay
creator: aurycat
description: Switches you to scene view when entering Play Mode instead of the default behavior of switching to game view.

name: Play Mode Scene Camera Mirror
creator: Ivylistar
description: Copies Scene View camera postiton and FoV to selected camera. To use it just add it as a component to your main camera!

name: Phys bones editor
creator: Talox
description: Helper tool for placing phys bones and contacts

name: Visual Expressions Editor
creator: Ha√Ø~
description: Visual Expressions Editor lets you edit face expression animations.

name: Animator As Code
creator: Ha√Ø~
description: Unity C# library to let you create Avatars 3.0 animator layers and animations using method chaining (fluent interface)

name: UdonExplorer
creator: Varneon
description: Unity Editor extension for easily exploring all UdonBehaviours in your Unity scene and detail information about them

name: Blendshape Viewer
creator: Ha√Ø~
description: Blendshape Viewer¬†lets you visually browse blendshapes.

name: Animation Viewer
creator: Ha√Ø~
description: Animation Viewer lets you preview animations in the Project view browser.

name: VRM Add-on for Blender
creator: saturday06
description: An add-on that adds VRM-related functions to Blender.

name: Unity Terrain Tools
creator: Unity Technologies
description: Unity Terrain Tools from the package manager doesn't work with the VRCSDK by default. This repo contains a simple one line code change to make it work. To install it, open the package manager and use the 'install package from git' option, then paste in the .git link.

name: Constraint Track Animation Creator
creator: Ha√Ø~
description: Constraint Track Animation Creator automates the creation of a gimmick that lets you animate an object to slide along a track using constraints.

name: tidalwav
creator: SkaillZ
description: WAV Loop Editor for Unity, allows you to easily create seamless music with an intro section that loops (natively works with unity AudioSource)

name: Skinned Mesh Armature Remapper
creator: Cascadian
description: A Unity Editor utility that can transfer skinned mesh renderers from one armature to another.

name: Unity Mesh Simplifier
creator: Whinarn
description: GOOD Mesh simplification (decimation) for Unity. The project is deeply based on the Fast Quadric Mesh Simplification algorithm, but rewritten entirely in C# and released under the MIT license.

name: UdonGraphTweaks
creator: orels1
description: Improving the Udon Graph workflow with hotkeys and shortcuts

name: CyanTrigger
creator: CyanLaser
description: CyanTrigger is a new way to write logic for SDK3 worlds in VRChat, with an interface that resembles VRChat‚Äôs SDK2 VRC_Trigger. CyanTrigger has full access to all of Udon and can work with UdonGraph and UdonSharp.

name: World Creator Assistant
creator: Varneon
description:
Unity Editor extension for automating VRChat world project package management
-Project Setup Wizard that allows automated batch import of VRCSDK, UPM packages, GitHub repositories, downloaded UAS assets and automatic setup of VRC layers
-Importer for keeping VRCSDK and GitHub repositories up to date
-Resources containing useful links and world creation related FAQ section

name: Controller Fix
creator: Dreadrith
description:
A Tool that serves to edit Controllers and Animation Clips to fix various issues
- (Unity 2019) Fixes Pasted and Duplicated assets hideflags (Shows in inspector). Can be used on pre-existing controllers and applies it on runtime during editing too.
- Turns clips with one start frame to two frames
- Turns off Loop time on constant clips
- Turns off Transition to self on Any state transitions to states with constant motions
- Adds buffer to states with no motion

name: TextMeshPro Atlas Compressor
creator: lox9973
description: This script can compress TextMeshPro texture and reduce world size

name: VRC Bakery Adapter
creator: Merlin
description:
A script that handles converting Bakery RNM and SH directional lightmap bindings into a format that VRChat can process without the Bakery scripts being whitelisted

This script is only necessary if you are using the RNM or SH directional light modes on Bakery.

name: UdonRabbit Analyzer
creator: Natsuneko
description: A Roslyn Analyzer for UdonSharp. It has an error display for methods that aren't exposed to Udon, an error display for syntaxes that UdonSharp doesn't support.

name: Selection Helper
creator: Dreadrith
description: Variety of Tools for Selection. Filter Objects by Component type and Select Avatar Bones easily.

name: UdonFlat
creator: lox9973
description: An Udon decompiler which can convert Udon graph to C#

name: AutoVRCCam
creator: Jar
description: A tool that lets you position the VRCCam in your scene before uploading your content. You can also use this to save your VRCCam position when re-uploading a world or avatar.

name: CyanEmu
creator: CyanLaser
description: CyanEmu is a VRChat client emulator in Unity. Test your SDK2 and Udon worlds locally in Unity without uploading! Read the Github wiki for extra features.

name: Show MeshRenderer Bounds
creator: Joniburn
description: Display Bounds of MeshRenderer on Editor

name: Selection helper
creator: Phasedragon
description: Editor script that allows you to select children by component. Adds a dropdown to the menu when you right click an object in hierarchy

name: EasyQuestSwitch
creator: Jordo
description: EasyQuestSwitch is a Unity Editor tool that automate changes in a scene whenever you change the project's build target, this allows a much faster workflow when building cross compatible worlds as you only need one project and one scene for both versions. You can plug virtually any component and get access to every variables that would be worth changing.

name: VRWorld Toolkit
description: VRWorld Toolkit is an Unity Editor extension made to make making worlds for VRChat easier and overall lower the entry-level to make a good performing world.

name: SceneAA
creator: BlueAmulet
description: Restores Anti Aliasing in the Unity Editor's scene view

name: Scene Textures Mass Setup
creator: dooly123
description: only changes the textures on meshrenders in a scene to be in line with the settings chosen in the inspector

name: [EditorScript] UdonHierarchy 1.0.0
creator: @PhaxeNor
description: A simple script to show what GameObjects in the hierarchy that has a Udon component on it.

name: SkinnedMeshBaker
creator: SHAJIKUworks
description: This tool converts SkinnedMeshRenderer to MeshRenderer while maintaining pose.

name: Slideshow Creator
creator: Poplopo
description: A slideshow asset and remote control, including an editor script that will allow you to easily populate the slideshow with images and VRCTrigger buttons for the remote control.

name: Terminal Dialog Editor
creator: Poplopo
description: A set of Unity Editor scripts that will enables the creation of computer dialog screens (ala text-based games, NPC conversations, etc).

name: BlenderWASD
creator: Maebbie
description: Custom Blender 2.8+ config used to make worlds without hassle, most recently used for Atoll of Ether. Includes a .blend file, custom keybinds and a script to see the gridscale (as you would in ProGrids). Please read the setup file and have a look through the video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1sPXOYgrZdE&list=PLHPl0SFKkUjNIZs5K9BV4pgXiLrQpEu2D

name: Client Starter
creator: naqtn
description: starts VRChat client automatically after world publishing is completed. You can go directly into published world and start to test it.

name: [Editor] Trigger Logger
creator: @PhaxeNor
description: Gives you a overview over all your triggers with the option to filter

name: Easy Event Editor
creator: Merlin
description: Allows reordering of Unity events and other useful things

name: alternative launch.bat
creator: naqtn
description: Provides mode selection (desktop or VR) feature before starting VRChat from Web browser.

name: Scruffy Shader Keywords Utility
creator: ScruffyRules
description: A Unity3D tool to remove potentially unused shader keywords on your avatar

name: OnUnityEditorVRCEmu
creator: naqtn
description: VRChat client emulation tool working on Unity editor environment. You can debug VRChat worlds with Unity editor functionality.

name: Picture Perfect Prefab
creator: IgbarVonSquid
description: Use this to take the perfect picture for world and avatar previews. Uses multiple overlays to show you what parts of the picture won't be visible under certain circumstances, such as on avatar pedestals or in the menus.

name: Iwsd Sub Inspector
creator: naqtn
description: A tool providing reorder list UI of event handling definition etc. (Unity editor extension, Not a prefab)
